items.name: Toasted Bread (GFO)
items.description: Choice of sourdough, fruit or gluten-free (2 slices), served with butter and jam

items.name: Prosciutto Egg Roll
items.description: Ciabatta bread, two eggs, prosciutto and choice of tomato sauce, barbecue sauce or aioli sauce

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Sourdough bread toasted (2 slices) with CHOPPED FRESH TOMATO and Garlic OR PESTO SAUCE

items.name: Savory Pie
items.description: Beef Pie served with caramelized onions and peas
